thread.title: Clearbridge Mobile Solution Selected For Heroku Partner App Showcase
thread.title_full: Clearbridge Mobile Solution Selected For Heroku Partner App Showcase

author: Shiv Kamal
title: Clearbridge Mobile Solution Selected For Heroku Partner App Showcase
text:
Clearbridge Mobile, an award-winning mobile app design and development studio, was recently featured in Heroku’s Partner App Showcase for its real-time user tracking and mobile engagement solution, Vuetrx . One of only nine applications featured, Vuetrx uses Beacon/BLE technology to recognize app users and location and send real-time data to relevant Salesforce accounts via Heroku Connect. “Clearbridge is excited to be featured on Heroku’s Partner App Showcase,” said Deepak Chopra, CEO of Clearbridge Mobile. “We have built dozens of solutions for clients using the Heroku platform, to allow for easy scalability as client user bases grow. The inclusion of Vuetrx helps demonstrate our expertise with the platform as well as strengthen our partnership with Heroku.”
The Heroku Partner App Showcase exhibits hand-picked apps and platform solutions from select Heroku partners which include source code and single-click Heroku Button deployments. With Vuetrx, Salesforce/Heroku customers have the ability to facilitate contextual, hyper-personalized user experiences. Using beacon technology, the solution adds real-time customer intelligence to the Salesforce account and allows for targeted loyalty campaigns to be pushed to users.
“We’re thrilled to have Clearbridge as part of the Partner App Showcase,” said Abe Pursell, Head of Heroku Alliances Business Development. “Their Mobile Tracking and Engagement App is a great resource, and exemplifies their skills as a Heroku partner.”
About Clearbridge Mobile
Clearbridge Mobile is a leading full-service designer and developer of world-class apps for mobile, wearable technologies and mobile payments. Founded in 2011, Clearbridge Mobile has developed over 200+ apps for Fortune 1000 clients that have been downloaded and used by millions of users, including the world’s first Host Card Emulation (HCE) / Near Field Communication (NFC) mobile payment and gift card solution. Its services include strategic consulting, UI/UX design, development, QA and maintenance. Clearbridge Mobile’s growing roster of clients include ABC, BlackBerry, Bravo, Disney, Dow Jones, Free The Children, NBC, Paypal, Telemundo, Tim Hortons, USA Today, Wall Street Journal and many more. http://www.clearbridgemobile.com/
